name: Calico Beans
ingredients: 1 cup chopped onion 1/2 cup brown sugar
1 qt. (﴾30-‐32 oz)﴿ can pork and beans 1/4 cup white sugar
1 can red kidney beans drained 1 tsp salt
1 can butter beans drained 2 Tlbs. prepared mustard
steps: Cook bacon crisp, drain and crumble. Brown onions and hamburger, drain.
Mix all the ingredients together. Place in casserole dish or dutch oven and bake at 40 about 30 minutes or until
